description: Defeat the impending menace, the mysterious "Ghouls"! Utilize new abilities with each transformation of your Heroes! Discover the fate that awaits a young man afflicted with amnesia... Embark on an unpredictable journey in the fully realized Story Mode! Play with friends in co-op, or compete against them for glory in the Arena! Form a team with 6 Heroes, and terminate the Ghoul threat with explosive techniques!
name: Dawn of the Breakers
